lead_paragraph: Harold T. Martin III kept his security clearance despite a record that included drinking problems, unpaid tax bills and an episode in which he posed as a police officer.

byline.original: By SCOTT SHANE and JO BECKER

headline.print_headline: ‘Big Red Flags’ Didn’t Prevent N.S.A. Breach
headline.main: N.S.A. Appears to Have Missed ‘Big Red Flags’ in Suspect’s Behavior

snippet: Harold T. Martin III kept his security clearance despite a record that included drinking problems, unpaid tax bills and an episode in which he posed as a police officer....
abstract: Former National Security Agency contractor Harold T Martin III, who is jailed on charges of stealing government documents and mishandling classified information over two decades, retained top-secret clearance despite well-documented troubles in his personal life; opinion is divided over agency's security clearance process.
